attributes.action: Let Snoop Dogg Perform In The Uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please let snoop dogg come in to the Uk , you dont know how many people this is disappointing. Snoop Dogg may have a past but doesnt everybody. The main focus is his future. He is a good huy and an amazing artist. All he wants to do is perform for his UK fans. Hip Hop has grown massive over here and it would be an honour for Snoop Dogg to perform here. So pleas can you let him in. There are things as second chances to please allow Snoop Dogg to Perform for his fans sake!
